query: What is Pride & Prejudice the book? What year?
summary:
1. In what year is Pride and Prejudice set? : r/janeausten
   Jun 13, 2021 ... Yes, she wrote the original draft much earlier, but when she revised that draft into the book we know today she used the 1811 and 1812 almanacs ...
   Source: https://www.reddit.com/r/janeausten/comments/nyt7ez/in_what_year_is_pride_and_prejudice_set/

2. Pride and Prejudice - Wikipedia
   Pride and Prejudice is the second published novel (but third to be written) by English author Jane Austen, written when she was aged 20–21, and later published ...
   Source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pride_and_Prejudice

3. 200 Years of Pride and Prejudice | Newberry Library
   Jane Austen was barely older than her 20-year-old heroine, Elizabeth Bennet, when she attempted to publish her novel, First Impressions, in 1797.
   Source: https://www.newberry.org/blog/200-years-of-pride-and-prejudice

4. Historical Context of Pride and Prejudice | Chicago Public Library
   Between 1797, when a young Jane Austen began work on what would become Pride and Prejudice, and 1813, when the novel was published, the French Revolution was ...
   Source: https://www.chipublib.org/historical-context-of-pride-and-prejudice/

5. Pride and Prejudice | Summary, Characters, Author, Book, Movie ...
   Pride and Prejudice is a romantic novel of manners by English author Jane Austen, published anonymously in three volumes in 1813.
   Source: https://www.britannica.com/topic/Pride-and-Prejudice
